# zero

**Type Property**

A view spacing instance that contains zero on all edges.

## Declaration

```swift
static let zero: ViewSpacing
```

## Discussion

You typically only use this value for an empty view.

## Creating spacing instances

- **init()**: Initializes an instance with default spacing values.

items.description: Initializes an instance with default spacing values.
